org.projecthaystack.server

Class HServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.projecthaystack.HProj
      • org.projecthaystack.server.HServer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BMPServer

    public abstract class HServer
extends HProj
    HServer is the interface between HServlet and a database of tag based entities. All methods on HServer must be thread safe.
    See Also:
    Project Haystack

      • op

        public HOp op(String name,
              boolean checked)
        Lookup an operation by name. If no operation is registered for the given name, then return null or raise UnknownNameException base on check flag.

      • about

        public final HDict about()
        Get the about metadata which should contain following tags:
        Specified by:
        about in class HProj

      • onAbout

        protected abstract HDict onAbout()
        Implementation hook for "about" method. Should return these tags: - serverName: Str - productName: Str - productVersion: Str - productUri: Uri - moduleName: Str - moduleVersion: Str - moduleUri: Uri

        protected abstract HGrid onNav(String navId)
        Return navigation tree children for given navId. The grid must define the "navId" column.

      • navReadByUri

        public HDict navReadByUri(HUri uri,
                          boolean checked)
        Read a record from the database using a navigation path. If not found then return null or raise UnknownRecException base on checked flag.

      • onNavReadByUri

        protected abstract HDict onNavReadByUri(HUri uri)
        Implementation hook for navReadByUri. Return null if not found. Do NOT raise any exceptions.

      • watchOpen

        public final HWatch watchOpen(String dis,
                              HNum lease)
        Create a new watch with an empty subscriber list. The dis string is a debug string to keep track of who created the watch. The lease is the requested lease time or null if not specified.
        Specified by:
        watchOpen in class HProj

      • watches

        public final HWatch[] watches()
        List the open watches.
        Specified by:
        watches in class HProj

      • watch

        public HWatch watch(String id,
                    boolean checked)
        Lookup a watch by its unique identifier. If not found then raise UnknownWatchErr or return null based on checked flag.
        Specified by:
        watch in class HProj

      • onWatchOpen

        protected abstract HWatch onWatchOpen(String dis,
                                      HNum lease)
        Implementation hook for watchOpen. If the client requested a specific lease time it is provided, otherwise it is null if a default should be used. The actual lease time in effect should be reflected via HWatch.lease.

      • onWatches

        protected abstract HWatch[] onWatches()
        Implementation hook for watches.

      • onWatch

        protected abstract HWatch onWatch(String id)
        Implementation hook for watch lookup, return null if not found.

      • pointWriteArray

        public final HGrid pointWriteArray(HRef id)
        Return priority array for writable point identified by id. The grid contains 17 rows with following columns: - level: number from 1 - 17 (17 is default) - levelDis: human description of level - val: current value at level or null - who: who last controlled the value at this level

      • pointWrite

        public final void pointWrite(HRef id,
                             int level,
                             HVal val,
                             String who,
                             HNum dur,
                             HDict opts)
        Write to the given priority array level.

      • onPointWriteArray

        Implementation hook for pointWriteArray

        protected abstract void onPointWrite(HDict rec,
                                     int level,
                                     HVal val,
                                     String who,
                                     HNum dur,
                                     HDict opts)
        Implementation hook for pointWrite

      • hisRead

        public final HGrid hisRead(HRef id,
                           Object range)
        Read history time-series data for given record and time range. The items returned are exclusive of start time and inclusive of end time. Raise exception if id does not map to a record with the required tags "his" or "tz". The range may be either a String or a HDateTimeRange. If HTimeDateRange is passed then must match the timezone configured on the history record. Otherwise if a String is passed, it is resolved relative to the history record's timezone.
        Specified by:
        hisRead in class HProj

      • onHisRead

        protected abstract HHisItem[] onHisRead(HDict rec,
                                        HDateTimeRange range)
        Implementation hook for hisRead. The items must be exclusive of start and inclusive of end time.

      • hisWrite

        public final void hisWrite(HRef id,
                           HHisItem[] items)
        Write a set of history time-series data to the given point record. The record must already be defined and must be properly tagged as a historized point. The timestamp timezone must exactly match the point's configured "tz" tag. If duplicate or out-of-order items are inserted then they must be gracefully merged.
        Specified by:
        hisWrite in class HProj

      • onHisWrite

        protected abstract void onHisWrite(HDict rec,
                                   HHisItem[] items)
        Implementation hook for onHisWrite.

      • invokeAction

                                String action,
                                HDict args)
        Invoke an action identified by id and action.
